title: President grieved over death of Jang Group’s Chairman Mir Javed-ur-Rehman
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 31 (APP):President Dr. Arif Alvi on Tuesday expressed deep grief over the death of Jang Group’s Chairman and Publisher Mir Javed-ur-Rehman.
In a condolence message, the President prayed for the departed soul and grant of courage to the bereaved family to bear the loss with patience.
The President said that late Mir Javed-ur-Rehman played an important role in the promotion of journalism in the country and his services would always be remembered.
